duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute account strategy and sales pursuits for IT Managed Services
Penetrate greenfield/new logo accounts and build pipeline for sales opportunities
Serve as a trusted advisor and partner to prospective and existing clients
Understand Milestone services and abilities to represent them confidently to business leaders
Govern all aspects of the sales process and follow internal sales process
Formulate comprehensive plans that include account mapping and addressable market analyses

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
